rules_text:
When Senaric Gifter enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Plainscycling {2}, swampcycling {2} [i]({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
notes:
Games are a guide when all light goes out. They treasure the gift as they treasure the heart.

if an opponent is cursed, return target creature card with mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
